website_summaries.verdict: It doesn't matter if you prefer playing as Darth Maul or Yoda, or as a Clone Trooper or Battle Droid, you won’t find a more pulse-pounding Star Wars experience than this.
pros: Massive battles between factions from all Star Wars eras
Available on Xbox One, PS4, and PC
cons: The game's tutorials could be more helpful

customer_reviews.title: Not great for offline.
customer_reviews.text: I got this game because it was on sale for a good price. I don't have xbox live, due to a poor internet connection. My goal was for a fun offline shooter. I finished the campaign mode, which was great. Unfortunately the offline multiplayer isn't amazing. There isn't much to do.
customer_reviews.author: Avi Parshan

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Everything went well, from ordering to delivery. Can’t review the product because it was a gift to a friend out of time. I’m sure it was ok because I haven’t heard from them
customer_reviews.author: Chuck B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: Great game that the kids (and everyone else) love to play and this was also at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great condition and arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: No delay in getting the game and it came in flawless condition. The game itself wasn't as good as the first, but still fun to play nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Shipping
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described and works great. The listing stated 'one day shipping'. We didn't get the game until 4 days later, not next day. I don't know who was to blame.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Battlefront 2
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it.. $30 cheaper then buying on the Xbox 😎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a gift. Came in a timely manner. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Solid Game.
customer_reviews.text: Most notably, for me, the ‘Single Player - Campaign’ is a surprisingly good addition to this game. I’m glad it dawned on the creators to add this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged game!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the CD is being damaged or whatever. The game sticks at the Sullust campaign in the very begging when Lando ascends the road for infiltration!
customer_reviews.author: bukhuti abashidze

customer_reviews.title: Love this game. It’s so awesome
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome I love this new version of this game. I grew up on this game I use to play it on ps4 and love this so much better on the Xbox one. My favorite game to play and I play it everyday 😃😁
customer_reviews.author: Feb0215

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for sending my game😎😁
customer_reviews.text: I love it all! It brings back so many memories!
customer_reviews.author: David Black Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: On time and as promised. I would recommend to anyone to use Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Debb Ellingson

customer_reviews.title: Works great, no problems
customer_reviews.text: Son has been playing it non-stop since Christmas. No issues.

customer_reviews.title: Shipmemt was much longer then expectet
customer_reviews.text: Great game BNIB bought it for my sun birthday Shipment was to long not arrive on time !
customer_reviews.author: eyal aloush

customer_reviews.title: Drivers
customer_reviews.text: The drivers just throw the package over the fence instead of taking it to the door. I don’t like that. Every time they throw it.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: This is battlefront 2. I suck with the force but demolish as an assault
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME GAME!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Game! I play it on a daily basis. A real gaming challenge!
customer_reviews.author: Larkin Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great single player campaign
customer_reviews.text: I never play on-line multiplayer in any game, only single player campaigns. This is a really cool Star Wars game! If you liked Force Unleashed and Rouge Squadron then this game is for you! You rotate between flying missions with Tie Fighters, X-Wings, Millennium Falcon and more and foot missions as a Storm Trooper, Luke, Han Solo etc. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: endofus

customer_reviews.title: GATBAGE
customer_reviews.text: This game was complete garbage I recommend you play over watch instead beacause this game is so rage full if you rage easily DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Money Can't Buy You Happiness
customer_reviews.text: Garbage tier. As always, EA ruins everything it touches because it wants money more than it wants a quality game.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Battlefront II
customer_reviews.text: Battlefront II is a really good game, it’s guns and it's just an overall good game
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

product_meta.title: Star Wars Battlefront II - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Color:Original VersionMaster your own Star Wars hero’s journey. Embark on an endless Star Wars action experience from the bestselling Star Wars HD videogame franchise of all time. Rush through waves of enemies on Starkiller Base with the power of your lightsaber in your hands. Storm through the jungle canopy of a hidden Rebel base on Yavin 4 with your fellow troopers, dispensing firepower from AT-STs. Line up your X-wing squadron for an attack on a mammoth First Order Star Destroyer in space. Or rise as a new Star Wars hero – Iden, an elite Imperial special forces soldier – and discover an emotional and gripping single-player story spanning thirty years. Experience rich and living Star Wars multiplayer battlegrounds across all three eras: prequel, classic, and new trilogy. Customize and upgrade your heroes, starfighters, or troopers, each with unique abilities to exploit in battle. Ride tauntauns or take control of tanks and speeders. Down Star Destroyers the size of cities, use the Force to prove your worth against iconic characters such as Kylo Ren, Darth Maul, or Han Solo, as you play a part in a gaming experience inspired by 40 years of timeless Star Wars films. You can become the master of your own Star Wars hero’s journey.
feature_bullets: 100% Compatible With USA Xbox One Console
100% Compatible With USA XBOX Live Account
Work Exactly the Same as LOCAL Copy
